original_title: 獨臂拳王勇戰楚門九子
overview: Watch WANG YU as a one-armed savior battling the local goons in this martial arts classic. He has some rather amazing moves up his sleeve.
tagline: Watch WANG YU as a one-armed savior battling the local goons in this martial arts classic. He has some rather amazing moves up his sleeve.
title: One Armed Swordsman Against Nine Killers
